---
title: "Completed Cook Test Validation Samples"
author: "Michael Burns"
date: "3/16/2020"
output: html_document
---

This r markdown file is to figure out how many samples from the cook test validations have been completed either once or the full twice.  
```{r loading_data}
dataset <- read_xlsx("../Data/ML_Validation_Cook_Tests_MBurns.xlsx")
view(dataset)
```

```{r counting}
dataset %>% 
  select(c("Genotype", "SampleID", "Moisture.Avg")) %>%
  filter(Moisture.Avg != "NA" & Moisture.Avg !="#DIV/0!" & Moisture.Avg < 0.7 & !str_detect(string = SampleID, pattern = "Test.*")) %>% 
  group_by(SampleID) %>% 
  summarise(n = n()) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  summarise(sum_1 = sum(n == 1),
            sum_2 = sum(n == 2),
            sum_tot = sum_1 + sum_2)
```
